bibl.title: Luxury Glasses with Alexandrian Motifs.
bibl.note: Three examples: a gold-glass fragment with an Egyptian-style building, a cut glass beaker with an Egyptian scene, and a diatretum beaker with a representation of the Pharos light house.
bibl.seg: Auth Susan H., Luxury Glasses with Alexandrian Motifs.
Three examples: a gold-glass fragment with an Egyptian-style building, a cut glass beaker with an Egyptian scene, and a diatretum beaker with a representation of the Pharos light house.
